short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Mutes tabs that contains specific URL matches.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Designed to enhance your browsing experience by automatically muting tabs if a part of the URL matches with any of the URLs specified by the user in the options page. This is particularly useful for avoiding unwanted noise from specific websites.
